class.name: Opus
class.brief_description: Singleton that converts OGG/Opus audio file data to and from [AudioStreamWAV].
class.description: The Opus singleton converts OGG/Opus audio file data to and from [AudioStreamWAV]. This allows Godot to read and write .ogg files containing Opus audio streams at runtime.

method.name: decode
method.description: Decodes the [param data], which should be the bytes of an .ogg file containing an Opus audio stream, into [param audio]. [b]Note:[/b] If there are more than two channels, the audio will be downmixed to stereo.

method.name: encode
method.description: Returns a [PackedByteArray] containing the bytes of an .ogg file containing a single Opus stream containing [param audio]. Returns an empty [PackedByteArray] if the conversion fails. [b]Note:[/b] Only [AudioStreamWAV.FORMAT_8_BITS] or [AudioStreamWAV.FORMAT_16_BITS] audio streams can be encoded by this method. [b]Note:[/b] Looping audio streams are not supported and will be exported without the loop data.
